Goldman: Most S&P 500 stocks participated in the rally b/n Nov 2020-Apr 2021. But market breadth has narrowed substantially in recent months. Just 5 stocks ( $AAPL $MSFT $NVDA $TSLA $GOOGL ) have contributed 51% of the s7p 500 returns since April. 

When the market breadth narrows, the trend typically continues for 4 additional months while momentum "leaders" tend to outperform. 

Historically, periods of sharply declining breadth are followed by weak returns & deeper-than-avg drawdowns. Despite narrowing breadth, major drawdown risk during coming months appears limited due to light positioning, strong earnings growth & share prices reflecting likely Fed tightening.
